attributes.action: Insist that all Memebers of Parliament openly & accesibly account for all money paid to them from the Public Purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is completely unreasonable that in the 21st Century elected members of parliament should be able to claim money from the Public Purse for which they have no obligation to publicly declare. If a political process like this existed in any African country then MPs in Westminster would condemn the practice as yet another example of a corrupt political process. Why should our MPs be subject to taxation rules which differ from those that apply to the rest of the population? If employees in the private sector dealt with their expenses in the same way that MPs are allowed to then they would be dismissed and possibly even investigated for fraud.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
